dict.acceptation: 容忍；吃…吃得津津有味；〈古〉对…发怒；

sent.orig: Mucus works in your stomach by reducing pain caused by stomach acid.
sent.trans: 胃里的粘液可减少胃酸引起的胃痛。

sent.orig: They say stomach fluids could leak if the hole in stomach wall is not closed completely.
sent.trans: 他们说如果胃壁上的小孔没有完全闭合的话会导致胃粘膜渗漏。

sent.orig: Chronic or acute inflammation of the stomach, especially of the mucous of the stomach.
sent.trans: 扁桃体炎是扁桃体的炎症，它可以是急性的，也可以是慢性的。

sent.orig: Stomach: Suck it into a tight knot. (Check your chest and stomach for tension.)
sent.trans: 胃：用力收腹（查看胸部和胃部是否有拉紧）

sent.orig: Remember that time, I eat a bad stomach, a stomach ache the middle of the night.
sent.trans: 记得那一次，我吃坏了肚子，半夜肚子疼。
